entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY ENDED, Îles-de-la-Madeleine
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:23 AM AST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Îles de la Madeleine Airport 06:00 AM AST Monday 06 March 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -2.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -3.6°C
Wind: NNW 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:11 AM AST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
